subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Why Religion Still Matters
description: A short lesson to help you apply Why Religion Still Matters.

hook.text: In an age of science and reason, billions still pray, fast, and gather. Religion refuses to die. Maybe it shouldn't.

buildup.text: Religion provides what nothing else fully can: community, ritual, moral structure, meaning, and a framework for death.

discovery.text: Even its critics borrow from it. Human rights, compassion, and equality are rooted in religious soil.

twist.text: The question isn't whether religion is true. It's whether humanity can thrive without what religion uniquely provides.

climax.text: Religion matters because humans need stories bigger than themselves. Facts inform. Stories transform. Both are needed.

punchline.text: Facts inform. Stories transform. Religion gives us the stories we need most.

quiz.question: Why does religion continue to matter?
options: It uniquely provides community, meaning, moral structure, and a way to face death
